snippet: The Olympic champion Evan Lysacek withdrew from the U.S. Figure Skating Championships because of a slow recovery from November surgery on a sports hernia.
lead_paragraph: The Olympic champion Evan Lysacek withdrew from the U.S. Figure Skating Championships because of a slow recovery from November surgery on a sports hernia.

headline.seo: Evan Lysacek Pulls Out of United States Figure Skating Championships
headline.main: Lysacek Pulls Out of United States Figure Skating Championships
